messages.title: Local Roots
messages.content: I am your local Euro MP Paul Nuttall and I am standing for the Bootle seat at this year's General Election. I was born and brought up in Bootle, educated at Savio High School and Hugh Baird College.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Paul says bring our troops back from Afghanistan.
Paul wants to freeze immigration for 5 years.
Paul wants to stop paying the EU £45 million a day.
Paul wants no tax on minimum wage.
Paul believes in zero tolerance on crime.

issues.brexitEurope: Paul wants to stop paying the EU £45 million a day.
issues.environment: Paul is concerned about the state of Alexander Dock. We need a decision on its future.
issues.immigration: Paul wants to freeze immigration for 5 years.

housing.content: Paul wants to stop any more post office closures.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am your local Euro MP Paul Nuttall and I am standing for the Bootle seat at this year's General Election. I was born and brought up in Bootle, educated at Savio High School and Hugh Baird College.

images.caption: Paul supports local sports facilities in Bootle.
Paul is concerned about the state of Alexander Dock. We need a decision on its future.
Paul wants to stop any more post office closures.
Paul supports the Bootle pub trade. Keep our pubs open!
Paul has battled to keep our parks and open spaces clean.
